kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Exit For Loop If
kw.doc: Stops executing the enclosing FOR loop if the ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Fail
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.

kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Check if you went to the expected page
Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Load test data file
Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Get File
kw.msg: ${json_text} = { "role": "standard", "expected_logo": "Swag Labs", "expected_footer_text": "Sauce Labs. All Rights Reserved.", "menu_items": [ "All Items", "About", "Logout", "Reset App State...
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.msg: ${json_data} = {'role': 'standard', 'expected_logo': 'Swag Labs', 'expected_footer_text': 'Sauce Labs. All Rights Reserved.', 'menu_items': ['All Items', 'About', 'Logout', 'Reset App State']}
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.msg: ${data} = {'role': 'standard', 'expected_logo': 'Swag Labs', 'expected_footer_text': 'Sauce Labs. All Rights Reserved.', 'menu_items': ['All Items', 'About', 'Logout', 'Reset App State']}

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.msg: ${COMPONENTS_TEST_DATA} = {'role': 'standard', 'expected_logo': 'Swag Labs', 'expected_footer_text': 'Sauce Labs. All Rights Reserved.', 'menu_items': ['All Items', 'About', 'Logout', 'Reset App State']}
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.
